name: Uniform
description:
: 
 A uniform given to members of the galley staff.

name: Spacesuit
description:
: 
 You must equip this before going to the 
 floating garden or discovery pod.

name: Milk
description:
: 
 This Milk must be plant-based.

name: Butter
description:
: 
 This is a good source of calories.

name: Tortillas
description:
: 
 These look nice and fresh.

name: Snacks
description:
: 
 These look tasty.

name: Noodles
description:
: 
 Can’t make spaghetti without the noodles!

name: GPS
description:
: 
 A device that can be used to track your location and navigate.

name: Tofu
description:
: 
 This will be good with some curry powder.

name: Key
description:
: 
 This doesn't appear to be a door key.

name: Pepper
description:
: 
 Wonder how old this is…

name: Space Rock
description:
: 
 shiny space rock.

name: Martian Meatballs
description:
: 
 You're too afraid to ask what these are made of.

name: Giant Snail Shell
description:
: 
 There’s no one living here anymore!

name: Snowflake Crystal
description:
: 
 An oddity that won’t melt, 
 but holds the same sparkle as a snowflake!

name: Cosmic Curry Powder
description:
: 
 Curry is perfect for cold weather.

name: Terrestrial Space Fish
description:
: 
 This space fish lives on land.

name: Frog Fossil
description:
: 
 You can see the frog's skeleton in the rock.

name: Lightning Glass
description:
: 
 It shines in the light.

name: Baking Powder
description:
: 
 Does this mean baking powder is made of sand?

name: Flying Saucer Flour
description:
: 
 A small satchel of flour that makes your hands powdery.

name: Tomato Sauce
description:
: 
 A rich and flavorful tomato sauce, 
 perfect for pasta or as a base for other dishes.

name: Salsa
description:
: 
 It has some spice to it, but would go great with seafood!

name: Lunar Lamb Chops
description:
: 
 Several lamb chops, ready to be cooked.

name: Rice
description:
: 
 A fragrant and flavorful rice that pairs well with many dishes.
